start: ^Good morning, Arcas. I take it you slept well?

c-0: ^ Ready to get out there and explore, sir!
c-1: ^ `( Not... really, actually. I had a bit of a weird dream, and I'm kind of freaking out and I'm not sure I'm ready for this - )
g-0: ^I've decided you are to go to Corendia. Legends tell of a mysterious ^CY power source^CX hidden deep in an ^CYancient ruin.^CX
^You are to secure this power source and bring it home.
^What do we need a power source for?

c-2: ^ Yes, sir! I'll get straight to it.
c-3: ^ `( What do we need a power source for? )
^`( ...^1Well, Master probably has his reasons. I shouldn't question him. )

g-1: ^Excellent. Make it quick. And remember, ^CYleave no trace.^CX
